common.description: Collection of free utility tools for file conversion, generators, and other productivity tools

wordCounter.title: Word Counter
wordCounter.description: Count words, characters, paragraphs, and sentences in your text
wordCounter.placeholder: Type or paste your text here...

backgroundRemover.title: Background Remover
backgroundRemover.description: Remove background from images easily - All processing in browser
backgroundRemover.tips: Auto mode works well for white/bright backgrounds. Color mode for removing specific colors. Edge mode for automatic detection.

digitalRuler.title: Digital Ruler
digitalRuler.description: Measure physical objects by placing them on your screen - Perfect for when you forget to bring a ruler
digitalRuler.dpiNote: Adjust DPI based on your screen. Use calibration for accurate measurements.
digitalRuler.calibrationInstruction: Place a credit card ({width} {unit} wide) on your screen and adjust the DPI slider until the ruler matches the card width exactly.
digitalRuler.instruction: Place the object you want to measure on top of the ruler displayed on your screen. Adjust DPI for accurate measurements.
digitalRuler.autoCalibrated: Auto-calibrated to {dpi} DPI based on your device. For more accuracy, use manual calibration with a credit card.
digitalRuler.fullscreenInfo: Press ESC or click Exit Fullscreen to close
digitalRuler.tips: Use Auto Calibrate to automatically detect your device DPI. For best accuracy, use manual calibration with a credit card (8.56 cm or 3.375 in wide). Fullscreen mode gives you maximum ruler size for measuring larger objects.

watermarkMaker.title: Watermark Maker
watermarkMaker.description: Add text watermark to images easily - All processing in browser
watermarkMaker.tips: Adjust opacity and position to make watermark visible but not too intrusive. Use rotation for diagonal watermarks.

errors.noImageOrText: Please select an image and enter watermark text!

imageRotatorFlip.title: Image Rotator & Flip
imageRotatorFlip.description: Rotate and flip images easily - All processing in browser
imageRotatorFlip.tips: You can rotate by 90°, 180°, or any custom angle. Flip horizontal for mirror effect, flip vertical to invert.

imageConverter.title: Image Converter
imageConverter.description: Convert image formats (JPG, PNG, WebP) - All processing in your browser

colorPsychology.title: Color Psychology & Composition
colorPsychology.description: Analyze color psychology and composition from images - All processing in browser
colorPsychology.aboutDescription: Color psychology studies how colors affect emotions, behavior, and human perception. This analysis helps understand the message conveyed through the color palette in your image.

qrCode.title: QR Code Generator
qrCode.description: Generate QR Code from URL, text, or other data
qrCode.enterTextToGenerate: Enter text or URL to generate QR Code

passwordGenerator.title: Password Generator
passwordGenerator.description: Generate strong and random passwords for maximum security

errors.selectAtLeastOne: Please select at least one option!

colorConverter.title: Color Converter
colorConverter.description: Convert colors between HEX, RGB, HSL, and CMYK

errors.enterColorValue: Please enter a color value first!
errors.invalidHex: Invalid HEX format. Use format #RRGGBB or RRGGBB
errors.invalidRgb: Invalid RGB format. Use format: R, G, B (example: 255, 0, 0)
errors.invalidHsl: Invalid HSL format. Use format: H, S%, L% (example: 0, 100%, 50%)
errors.invalidCmyk: Invalid CMYK format. Use format: C%, M%, Y%, K% (example: 0%, 100%, 100%, 0%)

randomNumberGenerator.title: Random Number Generator
randomNumberGenerator.description: Generate random numbers with customizable range and count
randomNumberGenerator.allowDuplicatesHint: If disabled, all numbers will be unique (requires range ≥ count)
randomNumberGenerator.clickGenerate: Click Generate to create random numbers
randomNumberGenerator.tips: Use integer mode for whole numbers. Use decimal mode for floating point numbers. Disable duplicates to get unique numbers only (useful for lotteries and selections).

errors.minMaxError: Minimum value must be less than or equal to maximum value!
errors.noDuplicateError: Cannot generate unique numbers. Range is too small for the count!

caseConverter.title: Case Converter
caseConverter.description: Change text format with various styles
caseConverter.placeholder: Type or paste your text here...

textCleaner.title: Text Cleaner
textCleaner.description: Clean text from extra spaces, duplicate lines, and more

loremIpsum.title: Lorem Ipsum Generator
loremIpsum.description: Generate placeholder text for your design and mockups

textDiff.title: Text Diff Checker
textDiff.description: Compare two texts and see the differences

readabilityAnalyzer.title: Readability Analyzer
readabilityAnalyzer.description: Analyze text readability level using Flesch-Kincaid

keywordDensity.title: Keyword Density Checker
keywordDensity.description: Analyze keyword density in text for SEO

regexTester.title: Regex Tester
regexTester.description: Test and debug regular expressions with live preview

colorPalette.title: Color Palette Extractor
colorPalette.description: Extract dominant color palette from images

colorPicker.title: Color Picker
colorPicker.description: Pick colors and get HEX, RGB, HSL codes

gradientGenerator.title: CSS Gradient Generator
gradientGenerator.description: Create CSS gradients with visual editor

passwordStrength.title: Password Strength Checker
passwordStrength.description: Check password strength in real-time - 100% client-side

aesEncryption.title: AES Encryption / Decryption
aesEncryption.description: Encrypt and decrypt text using AES-256 - 100% client-side

csvJsonConverter.title: CSV ↔ JSON Converter
csvJsonConverter.description: Convert between CSV and JSON formats

codeFormatter.title: Code Formatter
codeFormatter.description: Format and beautify HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and JSON code

kprCalculator.title: KPR / Loan Calculator
kprCalculator.description: Calculate monthly installments for KPR or loans

bmiCalculator.title: BMI Calculator
bmiCalculator.description: Calculate Body Mass Index to determine weight status

discountCalculator.title: Discount Calculator
discountCalculator.description: Calculate price after discount and amount saved

compoundInterest.title: Compound Interest Calculator
compoundInterest.description: Calculate investment growth with compound interest

aspectRatio.title: Aspect Ratio Calculator
aspectRatio.description: Calculate dimensions based on aspect ratio or vice versa

ageCalculator.title: Age Calculator
ageCalculator.description: Calculate your exact age from birth date with detailed breakdown
ageCalculator.enterBirthDate: Enter your birth date to calculate age
ageCalculator.tips: This calculator shows your exact age including years, months, and days. It also displays your next birthday countdown and zodiac sign.

errors.futureDate: Birth date cannot be in the future!

percentageCalculator.title: Percentage Calculator
percentageCalculator.description: Calculate percentages, percentage changes, and reverse percentage calculations
percentageCalculator.percentageOfDescription: Calculate what percentage of a number equals another value
percentageCalculator.percentageChangeDescription: Calculate the percentage change from one value to another
percentageCalculator.reversePercentageDescription: If a value is X% of something, find the original value
percentageCalculator.tips: Use Percentage Of to find a portion of a number. Use Percentage Change to calculate increases or decreases. Use Reverse Percentage to find the original value when you know the result and percentage.

ipChecker.title: What's My IP?
ipChecker.description: Check public IP address and browser User Agent

metaExtractor.title: Meta Tag Extractor
metaExtractor.description: Extract meta tags, Open Graph, and SEO information from websites

httpHeader.title: HTTP Header Checker
httpHeader.description: Check HTTP response headers from websites

dnsChecker.title: DNS Record Checker
dnsChecker.description: Check DNS records (A, CNAME, MX, TXT) from domain

siteDownChecker.title: Site Down Checker
siteDownChecker.description: Check if website is down or inaccessible

sslChecker.title: SSL Certificate Checker
sslChecker.description: Check SSL certificate information from domain

urlParser.title: URL Parser & Builder
urlParser.description: Parse URL into components or build URL from components

techStackAnalyzer.title: Tech Stack Analyzer & Composer
techStackAnalyzer.description: Analyze or compose tech stack from website - Useful for developers
techStackAnalyzer.composeDescription: Select technologies to compose your tech stack. Click technologies to add/remove them.
techStackAnalyzer.tips: Use Analyze mode to automatically detect technologies from a website. Use Compose mode to manually build your tech stack and generate badges for README or documentation.

errors.fetchFailed: Failed to fetch website data. Make sure the URL is valid and accessible.
errors.analyzeFailed: Failed to analyze tech stack. Please try again or use Compose mode to build manually.

fancyText.title: Fancy Text Generator
fancyText.description: Generate text with unique styles for social media

randomName.title: Random Name Generator
randomName.description: Generate random names for testing or creativity

coinFlip.title: Coin Flip
coinFlip.description: Flip virtual coin for random decisions

stopwatchTimer.title: Stopwatch & Timer
stopwatchTimer.description: Digital stopwatch with lap function and countdown timer

timeZone.title: Time Zone Converter
timeZone.description: Convert time between time zones worldwide

dateCalculator.title: Duration Calculator
dateCalculator.description: Calculate days, hours, and minutes between two dates

unixTimestampConverter.title: Unix Timestamp Converter
unixTimestampConverter.description: Convert between Unix timestamp and date format - Essential for developers
unixTimestampConverter.tips: Unix timestamp is the number of seconds since January 1, 1970 (UTC). You can enter timestamp in seconds (10 digits) or milliseconds (13 digits). The tool automatically detects and converts both formats.

errors.invalidTimestamp: Invalid timestamp! Please enter a valid Unix timestamp (seconds since 1970).
errors.timestampTooLarge: Timestamp is too large! Maximum supported year is 2100.
errors.invalidDate: Invalid date format! Please enter a valid date and time.

pdfMerger.title: PDF Merger
pdfMerger.description: Merge multiple PDF files into one

pdfSplitter.title: PDF Splitter
pdfSplitter.description: Split or extract pages from PDF

pdfCompressor.title: PDF Compressor
pdfCompressor.description: Compress PDF file size without significant quality loss

youtubeDownloader.title: YouTube Downloader
youtubeDownloader.description: Download videos and audio from YouTube in various qualities

tiktokDownloader.title: TikTok Downloader
tiktokDownloader.description: Download videos and audio from TikTok

instagramDownloader.title: Instagram Downloader
instagramDownloader.description: Download photos, videos, reels, and stories from Instagram

twitterDownloader.title: Twitter/X Downloader
twitterDownloader.description: Download videos and images from Twitter/X

articles.defaultContent1: {toolName} is one of the best tools to help you with various tasks. This tool is designed with a simple and easy-to-use interface, so anyone can use it without special expertise.
articles.defaultContent2: With {toolName}, you can complete your tasks faster and more efficiently. This tool is available for free and can be accessed directly from your browser without downloading additional software.
articles.defaultContent3: To use this tool, simply follow the steps available on the page. Each step is designed to facilitate the process and ensure you get the best results.
articles.defaultContent4: If you have questions or experience problems while using the tool, feel free to contact our support team. We are ready to help you anytime.
articles.defaultTips: Use this tool responsibly and make sure you respect copyright and usage policies of the content you process.
